basics.name: Matt Shirley
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years expertise in test automation and front-end development. Experienced with Javascript and Ruby.

highlights: Developed unit and integration tests for back-end web services (JavaScript)
Reduce bottlenecks for the Care and Biomedical teams by developing a tool to automate repetitive tasks (Ruby)
Performed testing for mobile applications and back-end services
Fixed defects and annoyances for a React project (JavaScript)
Supported the implementation of a video chat service using React and Twilio by improving the user experience and responsiveness (JavaScript)
Improved development confidence by implementing an automated test framework for component testing (JavaScript)
Performed regression and exploratory testing for a social media platform
Implemented and maintained a end to end automated test framework (Javascript, Python)
Reduced time to create and populate test environments by developing a data generation tool (Javascript)
Championed an accessibility culture within the company and developed testing guidelines to satisfy regulation and compliance
Performed risk-based, exploratory testing to support an efficient feedback loop

work.summary: Took a sabbatical for a year and a half to travel Canada to freelance and study.
highlights: Developed small web applications for clients using React and Ruby on Rails
Continued contract employment with Asia Pacific Digital providing technical consultation
Reduced the rate of undeliverable SMS messages by redesigning the queueing algorithm (PHP)
Resolved defects for a messaging and email platform (Javascript, SQL)
Communicated with delivery partners to maintain cost-effective and efficient SMS routing
Performed troubleshooting internally and externally to resolve technical and billing issues

education.summary: Coursework focused on databases, full-stack development, testing planning and project management foundations
